c74object.name: fl.ewma~
c74object.digest: Calculates a per sample exponentially weighted moving average.
c74object.description: Averaging takes a parameter alpha to determine the rate of change. This parameter can be set differently for increasing and decreasing values. Frames are expected to be of uniform size, otherwise the object will reset. The output is the same size as the input.

entry.name: 0. /alpha_up [double]
entry.description: Sets the alpha value for weighting when the input is increasing.

entry.name: 1. /alpha_down [double]
entry.description: Sets the alpha value for weighting when the input is decreasing.
